ComicInfo.Title: Radical Time
ComicInfo.Summary: Cybertron is under siege. Carnivorous Insecticlones and rust worms are eating the planet. Exarchon is returned, but Megatron’s not giving up without a fight. Against impossible odds, Optimus Prime, Ultra Magnus, and Bumblebee must make an unthinkable choice: Is Cybertron even worth saving?
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-18 17:50:18. [CVDB919667]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Blacky Shepherd, Evan Gauntt, Josh Burcham, Nicole Goux
ComicInfo.Editor: David Mariotte, Riley Farmer, Tom Waltz
ComicInfo.Characters: Acid Storm, Backstreet, Blades, Blaster, Bumblebee, Bumper, Chromia, Codexa, Glyph, Highbrow, Hound, Ironhide, Javelin , Jhiaxus, Lightbright , Lodestar, Megatron, Novastar, Optimus Prime, Perceptor, Road Rage, Sideswipe, Sky Lynx, Smokescreen, Strika, Strongarm, Subsea, Tap-Out, Termagax, Ultra Magnus, Vibes, Wheeljack, Windblade
